content.body: What is the prerequisite for being able to join TC39-delegates? It only shows me "View". Is it trying to match my email with that at my employer and through which I am a delegate? That didn't seem to work.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: What is the prerequisite for being able to join TC39-delegates? It only shows me "View". Is it trying to match my email with that at my employer and through which I am a delegate? That didn't seem to work.
